title: Losing LP for a remake
body: My Team decided to ban instead of communicate with me and banned my main champ Yasuo. I haven't done anything to these people I don't know them so I decided fuck it im gonna play teemo I was afk in lane for the first few minutes grabbing a drink got back still in lane and it gave me the option to cast a remake vote but everyone was moving including me. I casted the voted happy to get out of the game with the idiots that don't communicate but instead just ban someones main, get out of game to have the message Leave (Remake) -18 LP can someone explain to me how this would be my fault? I was lvl 2 and just started to play. im pretty pissed I want my LP back this is just retarded...

replies.body:
Banning a champ is bad but could have been accidental, esp with yas because he is pretty much permabanned . 

Being a dick about it was your choice. There are 138 champs to play. 

My advice - dont be a dick.
The other guys are right. The only people who lose lp in a remake are those that caused it. Which in this case was you
If you are afk for over 90 seconds in the first 3 minutes, the game will mark you as AFK. This can be cancelled by just moving the camera so it doesnt effect anyone who isnt afk.

You probably lost LP because you were the one who was marked as AFK, even if you did join the game just a few minutes late. That's my guess. It doesn't really matter if joined late. You were inactive for a few minutes - long enough to trigger the remake option/have someone cast the vote. 

I doubt you'll get your LP back if that's the case, unfortunately.
